price: (77) [That is Our] established way for those We had sent before you of Our messengers; and you will not find in Our way any alteration.
arabic: سُنَّةَ مَن قَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا قَبۡلَكَ مِن رُّسُلِنَاۖ وَلَا تَجِدُ لِسُنَّتِنَا تَحۡوِيلًا

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: sunnata man qad arsalnā qablaka min rusulinā walā tajidu lisunnatinā taḥwīlan
